title: Update downloading at 300Kbps?
body: My internet is much faster than this, I'd rather not wait 6 hours to update{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Dry those tears Amumu, I'm here to help!  At least until you have a tantrum.  :P  Unless you're having any specific errors during this patching, it's best to leave it alone and let it do its thing.  Closing it out too early could cause the patcher to scan all of your game files for corruption before starting the update.  

Once your'e all done, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up any instability that might be slowing down your connection to the patching server.
